tips.0: 'El Obelisco' was built in 1936 on the occasion of the fourth centenary of the so-called first foundation of Buenos Aires by Pedro de Mendoza.
tips.1: In March 1937, by decree of the mayor Mariano de Vedia y Miter, the opening of 9 de Julio Avenue was ordered, based on the designs of Della Paolera.
tips.2: The Colón theater operated in two buildings, the first located in the Plaza de Mayo until 1888 and the second located in front of the Plaza Lavalle, which took 20 years to be built until its inauguration in 1908.
